data.title: Westfield River at Knightville, MA
data.meta_description: Monitoring location 01179500 is associated with a Stream in Hampshire County, Massachusetts. Current conditions of Discharge, Elevation of reservoir water surface above datum, and Gage height are available. Water data back to 1909 are available online.
data.text:
Monitoring location 01179500 is associated with a Stream in Hampshire County, Massachusetts. Current conditions of Discharge, Elevation of reservoir water surface above datum, and Gage height are available. Water data back to 1909 are available online.
